title: I dreamed that I was eating sweets

preview.html: I dreamed that I ate sweets in a dream through the website Vision roy2a.com. There are many different types of sweets, which are often made from sugar or honey. Sweets have many benefits, but eating a lot of them may lead to problems such as tooth decay, obesity, and other problems. Today, through this article, we will present to you I dreamed that I was eating sweets. For great translators such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, and other dream interpretation scholars, follow us according to the condition of the dreamer, whether she is single, married, or pregnant. I dreamed that I was eating sweets by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin explained the vision of eating sweets in a dream. It indicates Abundance of goodness and blessings in the life of the dreamer. He dreams of eating Eastern or Western sweets, which portends happy news and promising events in the coming period. Eating a lot of sweets in a dream indicates an abundance of sustenance for the dreamer. They see that they are eating sweets and they were delicious in the dream. It indicates that the monarch is wise and has the ability to discriminate. Between right and wrong. Eating sweets in a dream indicates that the dreamer will get rid of all problems and worries in his life. Buying sweets and eating them in a dream indicates that the dreamer is living a period full of comfort, stability and happiness. See another interpretation: Interpretation of the vision of eating sweets by Ibn Sirin. I dreamed that I was eating sweets according to Nablus. It will be interpreted Al-Nabulsi Seeing eating sweets in a dream indicates the dissolution of torment and the removal of their fortune tellers. Seeing in a dream eating sweets filled with honey indicates the closest marriage fortune teller, and God knows best. Eating sweets in a dream indicates many worries and anxieties in the life of the dreamer. Seeing in a dream eating date sweets indicates that The monarch is a good and religious person. See another interpretation: Interpretation of seeing sweets in a dream. I dreamed that I was eating sweets for single women. Seeing women alone eating sweets with pleasure in a dream says that someone she loves will propose to her soon, and God knows best. Eating colorful sweets in a woman’s dream indicates that she will hear news Happy about her life in the near future. Seeing isolated people eating Christmas sweets in a dream, this indicates that she will marry a good man who has many good qualities. I dreamed that I ate sweets for a married woman. Seeing a married woman eating sweets in a dream, this indicates that God will provide her with many blessings. Goodness and blessings to her and her family. Buying sweets and eating them in a married woman’s dream indicates that she will announce pregnancy soon, and God knows best. Eating basbousa in a married woman’s dream indicates that he is living a married life full of stability and happiness. See another interpretation: Dreams indicate the return of divorced people. I dreamed that I was eating sweets, for pregnant women, seeing a pregnant woman. She eats sweets in a dream and confirms that her birth process will be easy and that she and her child will be healthy, and God knows best. Eating delicious sweets in a pregnant woman’s dream, which indicates that she will give birth to a boy, and God knows best. I dreamed that I ate sweets for a man. Seeing a man eating sweets in a dream indicates that he must repent for his sins.

title: Interpretation of seeing an electric fish in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing an electric fish in a dream, and the electrical plug is responsible for the electrical connection. Seeing electricity in a dream means success and success. Seeing an electric shock can indicate adversity and trouble, and we will explain this in detail by providing interpretations by the great imams of interpretation such as Ibn Sirin and other scholars of interpretation of visions and dreams in ancient and modern times. The interpretation of seeing an electrician fish in a dream for a young man and a single girl, for a married man, a widower and a divorced man. And also for a pregnant woman, so join us on the vision site. What is the interpretation of seeing an electrical outlet in a dream according to Imam Ibn Sirin? Seeing electricity in a dream indicates achieving success and excellence in all areas of life. Seeing electrical cables indicates exposure to trouble and adversity. Seeing an electric spark indicates exposure to temptation And anguish and sadness. Seeing bare and charged wires indicates the presence of corrupt people in the dreamer’s life. What is the interpretation of a dream about electricity for a married woman? Seeing electrical wires in a married woman’s dream indicates marital problems and quarrels. If a married woman sees that her husband is hurting her with electricity, it indicates serious problems that may lead to Divorce. Seeing a power outage indicates worries and problems, and if the power comes, it shows the end of disputes and problems. What is the interpretation of a dream about electricity and water? Seeing electricity touching water indicates loss of a job or unfulfilled desires and may indicate illness or death. Seeing an electric shock indicates repentance Of sin. What is the interpretation of a dream about an electric spark? Seeing an electric spark in a dream indicates many quarrels and hostility with relatives or neighbors. Seeing that the fortuneteller was exposed to an electric spark indicates the passage of many problems and tribulations. If someone sees a power outage in a house and there is a sick person, mention And his death. What is the interpretation of a dream about an electric spark for a single woman? Seeing electrically charged wires It indicates the presence of people who hate insight. Seeing an electric spark It indicates a major problem in single life. Seeing an electric diamond indicates harm and abuse from people nearby. Looking at the power switches or plug Energy indicates that the dreamer controls all his actions and deeds. What is the interpretation of a dream about a power outage for a single woman? Seeing a power outage in a dream for a single woman indicates exposure to trouble or a failure in worship. If an unmarried girl sees someone electrocuting her, it shows that she has been subjected to injustice. If An unmarried woman saw herself absorbing electricity. It shows quick decisions. What is the interpretation of a dream about an electric shock for a single woman? Seeing an electric shock in a dream for a single woman indicates serious problems or a serious illness. Seeing an electric shock indicates corruption and fear. A girl was shocked by seeing a lightning bolt. It indicates exposure to trouble and can It indicates failure and failure. Seeing exposed electrical wires in a girl’s dream indicates machinations and misfortunes in her life.

title: The 30 most accurate interpretations of seeing a black spider in a dream, according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a black spider in a dreamThe spider.Interpretation of seeing a black spider in a dreamThe interpretation of a dream about a black spider, according to many interpreters, carries a lot of bad and bad news and often indicates the presence of a great danger surrounding the dreamer, threatening his life.It also indicates a situation A bad psychological feeling that the dreamer feels, as he feels tightness in his chest and this can lead him to change from psychological symptoms to symptoms of a real illness, so he has to prostrate a lot. It also indicates that there is someone waiting for the dreamer and wants to harm him. Most of the time, the spider indicates In a dream, it indicates negative feelings and emotions, self-destructive thoughts, or indicative bad moral things. It also indicates that there is a large amount of negative energy surrounding the dreamer at the present time, which he feels is limiting him and discouraging him in life. If the spider is on the dreamer’s pillow, This indicates that he is a bad personality who harms those around him, or that he is an unhealthy personality and emits negative energy that harms those close to him. The spider also indicates the failure or end of a new business project, and he may lose money in a fraud or fail to achieve something that the person would like to achieve. It can It indicates the loss of something big or dear, such as the loss of a home or a job, and it can refer to something dear to the dreamer and perhaps the loss of a loved one due to distance or long distance. Competition. It also expresses the consequences to which a person is exposed, especially if they are many, as this indicates exposure to many obstacles in the coming period and from different directions. Most interpreters agree that its color and appearance significantly change the interpretation of a dream, as color can indicate Red indicates poverty, while black indicates problems and fears. The interpretation of the vision also varies depending on its location in the dream. If it is on the ground, it means that you are walking on a bad road full of dangers, but if it is on the walls, it means that you are approaching bad people who are working to harm it. It also sometimes indicates bad desires that a person wants to achieve, so this vision is a message A warning to him to stop it. In fact, a spider indicates an uninhabited dwelling, so seeing it indicates ruin or separation, and perhaps the separation of spouses or the end of the relationship between lovers. Seeing a black spider in a dream according to Ibn Sirin is one of the undesirable signs for the dreamer in In the coming days, perhaps poverty or a serious illness will afflict him, and it could also indicate bad personal qualities that characterize the dreamer, such as bad morals or a bad reputation. Also, seeing him in a dream building a house for himself with electrical current, means poverty or a great loss of money. Which will be exposed to the people of that house, and the house may be robbed. The vision also indicates problems, fears, and sorrows that may surround the dreamer or will be exposed to them in the coming days. Interpretation of a dream about a black spider by Imam Al-SadiqImam Al-Sadiq says that the spider is in a dream.

title: What is the interpretation of seeing whole egg yolks in a dream?

preview.html: The Trend website provides you with a complete interpretation of seeing egg yolks in a dream. Therefore, we presented to you, our beloved followers, what is the interpretation of seeing boiled egg yolks for elderly women, married women, and pregnant women, as well as the interpretation of raw egg yolks in a dream, completely through the books of scholars in the interpretation of dreams and visions. What is the interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s vision of egg yolks? The interpretation of seeing a full boiled egg yolk in a dream is one of the visions that shows a good and long life for an individual. Seeing a lot of egg yolks in a dream is evidence of a lot of money that the dreamer will earn and a good and permissible profit. Also, seeing a lot of egg yolks in a dream is evidence of a lot of money that the dreamer will earn and a good and permissible profit. Egg yolks peeled with a stick or hanging in a full dream means that it is one of the dreams that indicates the dreamer’s marriage to a virgin woman. Collecting egg yolks in a bowl in a full dream is good news, a life full of luxury and harvesting a lot of food. Seeing yourself collecting egg yolks in a dream It is a praiseworthy vision of success and marriage for the dreamer. Eating full cooked egg yolks in a dream for an ordinary woman. Interpretation of a dream about eating boiled egg yolks for poor women is one of the dreams that indicates a close marriage with a good person. Also, seeing fully cooked egg yolks in a dream indicates a happy life and joys. And good nutrition. Seeing collecting egg yolks in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates marriage, fulfillment of desires, success, and success in her life. Cooking egg yolks or frying them in hot oil is a dream of days full of hot and important events. What is the interpretation of seeing egg yolks for a married woman? Interpretation of seeing yolks An egg and its unpleasant smell in a woman’s dream indicates corruption and uselessness in the world. Seeing a boiled egg yolk in a dream for a married woman is a praiseworthy vision, indicating goodness and a long life. A whole egg yolk in a woman’s dream is evidence of a calm and stable life and an end to the problems she suffers from. What is the interpretation of seeing egg yolks for a married woman? Seeing egg yolks scattered on the ground in a dream filled with a pregnant woman is one of the unpleasant visions and a sign of worries and problems. Eating whole egg yolks in a dream for a pregnant woman is considered desirable, and indicates kindness and grace, as It is evidence of easy childbirth. What is the interpretation of seeing an egg yolk for a man? The interpretation of seeing whole saffron in a dream for a man indicates that he will marry a virgin girl, and this is a good thing for him. Seeing a whole egg yolk in a dream for men also indicates good nutrition and abundance that he will receive. Seeing a whole boiled egg yolk in a dream means that he moves on to a new life and gets a promotion at work. The interpretation of seeing a raw egg yolk in a dream is complete. The interpretation of seeing a raw egg yolk shows that the woman in the dream is whole, it is evidence of a righteous and pious woman. Breaking an egg yolk or A yolk in a full dream is one of the dreams that shows the dreamer’s worries and sorrows. If you have a dream that you want to interpret, write it in a comment below and a team of experts will contact you as soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of my leg being injured in a dream: My leg was injured

preview.html: An injury to the leg, foot and shin in a dream for an unmarried girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced man, for a man, if his left leg is injured by glass, bandage the injured leg and sew it up. The wound in the thigh finger by Ibn Sirin, Ibn Shaheen, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq and other more detailed explanations in the continuation of the topic below. A wound in a leg in a dream. It is a very disturbing and frightening dream that causes a state of anxiety in the dreamer if he sees it, as a wound in a dream can indicate many negative changes that the dreamer will face in his life in the next stage of his life. Because it symbolizes that the dreamer is walking on the forbidden path and turning away from God Almighty in many religious matters, and it is written for the Muslim in public life, where the dream appears in various forms, including the blood falling from the wound in the dream, which it symbolizes. That the dreamer will fall into many debts in the dream...the next stage of his life. Interpretation of a leg wound in a dream. An injury to a leg, leg, or foot in a dream symbolizes errors, errors, and missteps, especially those related to behavior toward society and the family. A leg wound in one dream indicates wrong decisions in the matter of choosing a friend or partner. A leg wound in a dream is considered evidence that the dreamer is facing difficulties in many life problems at the current stage and will improve in the coming days. Also, seeing a wound in his leg in a dream means that the dreamer will pass He is in good health and will live many years happily and with peace of mind in the next stage. A wound in the leg without blood in the dream is evidence that the dreamer is able to bear all the responsibilities in life without complaining or feeling tired. A wound in his leg in the dream indicates that the dreamer will face many things. The bad that will happen to him in the near future. An injured leg in a dream without pain is evidence that he has lost sense of life and does not enjoy anything in it. Seeing small wounds in a dream is evidence that the dreamer is going through a very bad psychological state in the coming period. Seeing the bride in a dream before her wedding That she injured her leg means that her choice was wrong and she should rethink the matter. Interpretation of an injured toe in a dream: A toe being injured in a dream is evidence that the dreamer will be angry with God Almighty and suffer from worry and worry. An injured leg in a dream also indicates that the dreamer will see someone close to him In some problems and will suffer a lot of damage. If you see a finger with a nail inside it in a dream, it means that someone close to you is trying to harm you in life. Removing the nail from the toe in a dream is evidence that the dreamer will get a lot of money and wealth in the next stage of one His relatives. The flow of blood from a wound on his finger in a dream is evidence that the dreamer will get sick and betrayed in the coming days. Healing the wound on the finger in a dream is evidence that you will get rid of the crises that you are experiencing in public life and will obtain happiness, joy and enjoyment. Interpretation of a dream about a heel injury The foot in a dream is an injury

title: The dead asked the living to go with him

preview.html: Therefore, we will discuss the interpretation of seeing a dead person asking the living dead to accompany him in this article from the Al-Mufassir website, so follow us. Interpretation of seeing a dead person asking a living man for gold with him in a dream about a single girl. If an unmarried woman sees that she is going with the dead to a place she did not know before, in a dream and she She is afraid. She declares that she will follow the path of guidance and the right path in her life, God willing. And seeing that the dead person was asking the unmarried girl to go with him in a dream and she left. It shows that she will do good things in her life and stay away from bad things. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that The deceased has died, and he was asking her to go with him in the dream. A clear indication that the deceased misses her, and wants to visit him often during this period. The dreaming unmarried woman who sees that the deceased asks her to go with him to his house. This means that the unmarried person is thinking a lot. In visiting this dead person in his grave, and God knows best. See also: Seeing a dead father in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing the deceased. Ask the living person to go with him in a dream. About the married woman. If the married woman sees in a dream that the deceased was visiting her and wants to accompany him. This indicates that This married woman is doing bad things in her life, and God knows best. And if the married woman looks at the deceased in a dream, and asks you to go with him in the dream. The meaning states that she will put an end to the major problems that she is going through in this period of her life. And if the married woman sees that the deceased He is sitting with her, and she asked to go with him in a dream. It explains that she will walk on the path of truth and stay away from the path of falsehood in her life, and God knows best. And seeing a married woman in a dream means that the deceased asks her to go with him in the dream. Here it appears that there are bad things that this dreamer is going through and she ends them. God willing. Interpretation of seeing the dead asking the living to go with him in the dream. About the man and its meaning. If the dreamer sees in a dream that the deceased has died, go with me in the dream and see him. It indicates that there are some things that he will correct in this period of his life, and God knows best. And the dreamer saw In a dream, he was looking at the dead person, and he went with him to the dream. Here he declares that he will end many of the hardships that he was going through, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. And the dreamer’s vision in a dream is that he sees the deceased, and asks him to go with him in the dream. This indicates that this The dreamer will try to walk on the right path with his life. And seeing the dreamer in a dream, that he sees the unknown person dead, wants to go with him in the dream. This is a clear indication that he is dealing with some wrong topics and needs to be careful. If a pregnant woman sees in a dream that a deceased person wants to go with him in a dream. It indicates that she is doing bad things in the dream during this period of her life, and God Almighty is All-Knowing. If a pregnant woman sees The deceased in a dream, and she asked you to go with him in the dream. This is an indication that she will...

title: Interpretation of seeing the name Al-Rahman in a dream and its effects

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the name of the Most Merciful in a dream. The name of the Most Merciful is one of the most beautiful names of God Almighty. The mercy of God Almighty includes everything, and He is very merciful to His servants and creatures. It is called Surat Al-Rahman, as the name of God, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful, is mentioned in the honorable Sunnah of the Prophet, and some may dream of the name of God, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful in their dreams. Interpretation of the appearance of the name Ar-Rahman to a married woman. When a married woman sees the name Ar-Rahman in her dream, it has many connotations related to her, or it may be related to her husband or her children. These connotations are: It indicates that her husband seeks to please her, provides her with everything she needs, and seeks to make her happy. Or this dream may indicate that she She will give birth soon. Also, seeing the name Al-Rahman may indicate that the woman is religious and has a strong relationship with her Lord. Or it may show that her heart is merciful. The name Al-Rahman indicates that this woman is a good wife who provides her husband and children with everything they need and takes care of them. Seeing the name Al-Rahman in a dream for a married woman It indicates that her husband’s condition has improved for the better. This dream can also indicate relief from the worries and pain that the woman and her husband were suffering from. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing the name Fahd in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of the name of the Most Gracious for a pregnant woman. Seeing a pregnant woman in the name of God, Most Gracious, Most Merciful in her dream for her. Many interpretations may relate to her new baby. This may indicate that her birth is approaching and easy. This dream may also indicate that her sorrows and anxiety that she has experienced in her life will end. Moreover, this dream may indicate her closeness to God and her strong faith in Him. It could Seeing the name Eugenestatus for a pregnant woman indicates the kindness that she will receive and comfort in her pregnancy. This dream may indicate that her fetus is healthy and in good health. Some interpretive scholars have said that this dream indicates her good relationship with her husband and that she and her husband are happy with her pregnancy. Or that seeing the name Eugenestatus The Most Merciful in a pregnant woman’s dream may indicate that she is pregnant with a boy if she is at the beginning of her pregnancy. If she has not given birth yet and her pregnancy is delayed, then it is good news for her that she will become pregnant soon. See also: Dream interpretation of the name Abdullah in a dream. In the name of God, Most Gracious, Most Merciful to man. If the dreamer was a man and saw In a dream, in the name of God, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful, this can indicate many things that benefit the man or young man, and we explain them as follows: This vision indicates that he has good morals, adheres to his religion, and practices the teachings of religion. It can also indicate that he loves his wife very much and that He is tired of it. Or this vision may indicate the goodness and blessing that he will reap soon. Also, seeing the name Ar-Rahman in a man’s dream could indicate his success in life. But if he sees himself hearing the name Ar-Rahman from a beautiful girl, this is evidence of the many blessings he will be blessed with. And he should thank God Almighty for it. Then, seeing the name of the Most Merciful for a young man means that he will achieve his dreams, achieve them, and be happy with them. Or that the date of his wedding with the one he loves is approaching. If he hears the name of the Most Merciful in a dream, this may indicate the end of his worries and troubles. Seeing the name of the Most Merciful is approaching. A man whose name is Rahman also indicates that he is

title: The 50 best interpretations of a dream about my dead grandmother being alive by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about my dead grandmother being alive When I see my dead grandmother alive in my dream, I am of course full of happiness, people and happiness as long as I see her happy or smiling at me, but I still want to know more about this dream, and there is nothing better than resorting to experts in the world of dream interpretation to know their interpretations of this vision. Interpretation of a dream about my dead grandmother being alive We may find multiple interpretations of this vision, including good and evil. One of the interpreters said that seeing her indicates the imminent death of the dreamer, and others said that seeing her indicates the humanity of the dreamer and a lot of goodness and blessings that fill his life. If a person sees in a dream his deceased grandmother, whether male or female, the vision may express the extent of the dreamer's interest in working and striving in order to achieve the goals he has set in life, and it may also indicate that he will enjoy in the coming period a great psychological calm and confidence that there is nothing disturbing him. Seeing the dead grandmother alive in a dream is one of the visions that pleases the heart, as long as the dreamer sees her in a state that requires pleasure or charity from the dreamer. However, if he sees her in a bad way, the fortuneteller may suffer from some problems in his life that make him anxious and constantly worried about his future, or the woman may suffer from major marital disputes that put her life with her husband on the brink of collapse. This vision in general is one of the visions that makes the viewer feel as if he has never lost someone he loves and urges him to succeed in his life, whether at work or study. Seeing the dead grandmother, according to some interpreters, expresses the state of the dreamer in reality, and seeing her in a beautiful image And optimistic evidence of the stability of the dreamer's life, without anxiety and problems, and that he will achieve everything he wants in the near future. Future. As for seeing her in an unpleasant situation, it is evidence of a difficult period in her life full of worries and sorrows and may express his failure in something, a feeling of despair and inability to give. Interpretation of seeing my dead grandmother alive by Ibn Sirin The scholar Ibn Sirin interpreted this vision because in many cases he considered it good visions. The presence of the grandmother in a person's life gives him positive energy to improve his performance and seeing her in a dream has a great positive impact on his life, whether social or practical. A man who sees his grandmother smiling and giving him something in his dream while he is suffering from financial distress or marital problems will get rid of all of that and enter a new state characterized by happiness and reassurance. But if the man actually goes through a state of despair as a result of his repeated failures in achieving his goal, then seeing her motivates him to work hard and diligently, which will bear fruit in the future, and he will occupy a high social position in his society with his giving and diligence. If the girl is holding her grandmother's hand in a dream and feels confident in herself, then the vision is evidence of the comfort that the girl will feel in the coming period and that she will be happy with the presence of a good man in her life who supports her and marries her and lives with him in peace and security. Praying with the grandmother in a dream is one of the beautiful visions that indicate that the dreamer will get rid of

Praying with the grandmother in a dream is one of the beautiful visions that indicate that the dreamer He will get rid of it

title: Interpretation of the beauty of the face in a dream for a single woman, complete correct interpretations

preview.html: Today we present to you the interpretation of facial beauty in a dream for a single woman. In fact, girls always love to check their faces in the mirror and take care to make themselves as beautiful as possible. But what does it mean to see a beautiful face in a dream for a single girl? Is it one of those dreams that makes her feel happy and happy to see it because it brings her good news, or is it one of those dreams that she should pay attention to? This is what we will discover in the next article on the encyclopedia website, so stay tuned. Interpretation of the beauty of the face in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of the dream of the light and beauty of the face. Whoever sees in his dream a woman with a beautiful face and this woman was trying to get closer to the divine, then this vision is one of the good visions that indicate that the dreamer will achieve Happiness and hearing the good news that he has been waiting a long time. Time. If a person sees that he is looking in the mirror and sees that his face has become a beautiful shape and he feels happy and pleased to see him in a dream, then this dream is one of the good dreams that heralds to the dreamer that he will gain. A prominent position among the people around him. The beauty of the face in the dream of an unmarried girl. One of the promising visions for an unmarried girl is that she will meet a person with a beautiful face in a dream (man or woman), and this dream indicates that this girl enjoys good feelings and feels hope and optimism for the future, as he promised . That he will be able to achieve the dreams and ambitions that he aspires to, and only God knows. If a girl sees in her dream that her face has become beautiful and more beautiful than its real appearance, then this dream foretells that she will get rid of the problems that she suffers from in her life, and it also indicates that she will hear new good things in her life. . The next period of her life. An unmarried girl who sees in her dream that a beautiful girl with a beautiful face comes in a dream and approaches her, embraces her and kisses her, and the girl is satisfied with the presence of this beautiful girl, then this dream means that this girl will obtain many good things, God willing. Some commentators said that this vision is good news for the girl that God Almighty will give her a good husband with whom she can live a calm, stable and happy life. Interpretation of a dream about a white face for a single woman: One of the beautiful visions that a single girl sees in her dream is that she sees a white face in her dream, and this dream means that there is a young man. He will meet her and feel love and attraction towards her. And he will propose to her. If the girl who saw this vision is suffering from problems or sorrows in her life, then this vision is news to her that these problems will end and these obstacles will be overcome, and God knows best. If the girl sees that her face has turned white in the dream, then this dream is a dream. Good because it indicates that someone will propose to her and she feels comfortable with him and the marriage will take place between them. At this stage, we have finished presenting the opinions said by dream interpretation scholars about seeing the beautiful face of an unmarried girl in a dream, and we would like to remind you that dream interpretations are only legal matters, which can be right or wrong, and that a Muslim should not stop his life in these dreams. For more...
